description:
Uzaki starts her part-time job. Sakaki orchestrates a summer getaway for the four friends, including a fun day at the beach and a spooky night walk.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Natsu Da! Umi Da! Kimodameshi Tai!
Summer! The Beach! I Want to Test My Courage!
الصيف! الشاطي! أريد أن أخبر شجاعتي
夏だ! 海だ! きもだめしたい!
